DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study collect preoperative , operative postoperative clinical assessment patient qualify surgical implantation INBONE™ Total Ankle Prosthesis .
DOC.brief_title: INBONE™ Total Ankle Prosthesis With Long Talar Stem
DOC.detailed_description: The FDA approve `` limited enrollment '' registry provide u additional clinical data design pivotal IDE study . FDA state decision base upon `` adequate safety information '' submit part original IDE submission . Therefore , purpose `` limited enrollment '' registry study gather initial data device 's performance , use Calcaneal Stem .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject sufficient soft tissue muscle strength support stable , anatomic positioning motion arthroplasty component determine investigator 2 . Subject must sufficient skin wound coverage . 3 . Subject demonstrate subtalar joint insufficiency define follow : ( 1 ) range motion < 50 percent contralateral , nondiseased side ( 2 ) pain physical examination subtalar joint ( 3 ) fusion AND Subject demonstrates tibiotalar joint insufficiency define follow : 1. end stage arthritis determine investigator plain radiographs 2. pain physical examination tibiotalar joint 3. fusion 4. nonunion 5. fail Total Ankle Replacement 4.Subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 40 5.Subject sufficient calcaneal bone stock determine investigator 6.Subject able capable provide consent participate clinical investigation medical insurance cover cost associate medical care willing assume personal responsibility cost 7.Subject agrees comply protocol , include participate require followup visit investigation site complete study questionnaires 1 . Subject skeletally immature 21 year age 2 . Subject experience local systemic infection within past twelve month 3 . Subject symptomatic ankle disease treat operatively contralateral side 4 . Subject vascular kidney insufficiency 5 . Subject suspect neuropathy foot ankle 6 . Subject impaired vascular circulation affect limb 7 . Subject skin condition may impair wound heal 8 . Subject know allergy cobalt , chromium , molybdenum , titanium , aluminum , vanadium , nickel 9 . Subjects long term medication may compromise bone stock ( e.g . long term steroid , NSAIDS , etc. , physicians discretion 10 . Subject unwilling unable comply rehabilitation program 11 . Subject know pregnant , prisoner , mentally incompetent , and/or alcohol drug abuser 12 . Subject currently participate investigational study relate study 's preoperative postoperative care . 13 . Subject rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) 14 . Subject diagnosed osteoporosis define DXA tscore > 2.5 .
